Package com.jummania.model

Record Class MetaData

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
com.jummania.model.MetaData
public record MetaData(int totalPages, int itemCount, int maxBatchSize) extends Record
Represents metadata for a paginated list.

This class stores information about a list that is split into pages:

  • totalPages — the total number of pages currently in the list
  • itemCount — the total number of items across all pages
  • batchSizeLimit — the maximum number of items allowed per page

It also provides a utility method toMeta(int, int, int) to generate a JSON string representation of the metadata.
